modules.description: This module enables constructing and modifying OpenAPI documentation with metadata, schemas, and HTTP route definitions using a builder pattern, while also supporting middleware composition and server execution. It operates on OpenAPI specification objects, HTTP method handlers, and middleware pipelines, facilitating use cases like self-documenting APIs, multicore server deployments, and extensible web applications with integrated metadata.

This module provides functions to build and manipulate OpenAPI specifications with metadata, schemas, and HTTP routes using a fluent interface. It works with OpenAPI objects, HTTP handlers, and middleware pipelines to enable self-documenting APIs and extensible web applications. Concrete use cases include generating API documentation automatically from route definitions and deploying multicore servers with integrated metadata.
